data.message: These international Eminem fans make me sick. They make no sense at all and their comments aren't even relevant to the post.

replies.message: Exactly, fuckin stans just want alot of "likes" like it fuckin matters

They make me ashamed to be an Eminem fan and I hate how the girls and internationals call themselves "Stan". No...Stan is a song, and you are not Stan from the music video. Quit using that term. And they fucking praise everything by Eminem. Yeah, he has a few bad songs, like most recently Phenomenal, but they act like its the best thing he ever put out! I don't know what they're trying to prove.
You've got a lot of issues^^
My name is *chicka chicka* Slim Shady
Nas are you serious right now? How do I have issues?
